Subject: Change default Port
Description:
Dear Sir or Madam,

We would like to change the default port 443 to another. Please provide us with the best way to do so. We run about 900 Clients with the agent on port 443 and already tried it with a registry change which didn't lead to success. We managed to install a new client with a different port, but would consider this not as a solution as we already have about 900 clients running with old port of 443. Looking forward for your help.
Kindly Sebastian Boe√ü
What_We_Know__c:
Connected in a remote session with the customer and performed the port separation procedure,
also provided him with IP change EPPsetServer tool for the clients.
Next_Steps__c: Waiting for the customer to get back next week after he tests it out on 5-10 computers
